title: Solar Gouache
description: Un style d'illustration vibrant et contrasté imitant la gouache ou l'aquarelle opaque sur papier texturé. Caractérisé par une palette limitée en bichromie ou trichromie, des coups de pinceau expressifs 'mouillé sur sec' et une utilisation importante de l'espace négatif pour définir les formes sans contours distincts.
description_en: A vibrant, high-contrast illustration style mimicking loose gouache or opaque watercolor on textured paper. Characterized by a limited duotone or tritone palette, expressive wet-on-dry brushwork, and the heavy use of negative space to define forms without distinct outlines.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration vibrant et contrasté imitant la gouache ou l'aquarelle opaque sur papier texturé. Caractérisé par une palette limitée en bichromie ou trichromie, des coups de pinceau expressifs 'mouillé sur sec' et une utilisation importante de l'espace négatif pour définir les formes sans contours distincts.
prompt: A vivid, expressive gouache painting of {{subject}}, executed in a loose, gestural style reminiscent of Fauvism and contemporary editorial illustration. The artwork occupies the entire canvas, full bleed, edge-to-edge, with absolutely no borders, frames, or margins. The rendering technique mimics opaque watercolor and gouache applied wet-on-dry, characterized by hard-edged shapes, visible bristle marks, and the organic pooling of pigment. The composition relies heavily on the interplay between positive colored shapes and the negative space of the paper, which cuts through the image to define lighting and spatial depth. The color palette is strictly limited and high-contrast, dominated by varying opacities of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, creating a striking duotone or tritone effect. Shadows are not black but are rendered in deep, saturated blocks of {{accent_color}}, while highlights are represented by the raw, unpainted surface. The {{subject}} is constructed from confident, swift brushstrokes that prioritize energy and movement over anatomical precision. Textural details include the roughness of cold-press watercolor paper, the uneven transparency of the paint, and occasional dry-brush scratching. The lighting is flat yet intense, suggesting a bright, direct sun that casts sharp, geometric shadows. The atmosphere is breezy, spontaneous, and artistically raw. The image must extend to every corner of the frame, ensuring the environment and {{subject}} are fully integrated into a seamless, borderless scene.
